 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Larabros\Elogram\Http\Clients;
 4: 
 5: use Exception;
 6: use GuzzleHttp\ClientInterface;
 7: use GuzzleHttp\Exception\ClientException;
 8: use Larabros\Elogram\Http\Response;
 9: 
10: /**
11:  * A HTTP client adapter for Guzzle.
12:  *
13:  * @package    Elogram
14:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
15:  * @link       https://github.com/larabros/elogram
16:  * @license    MIT
17:  */
18: final class GuzzleAdapter extends AbstractAdapter
19: {
20:     /**
21:      * The Guzzle client instance.
22:      *
23:      * @var ClientInterface
24:      */
25:     protected $guzzle;
26: 
27:     /**
28:      * Creates a new instance of :php:class:`GuzzleAdapter`.
29:      *
30:      * @param ClientInterface $guzzle
31:      */
32:     public function __construct(ClientInterface $guzzle)
33:     {
34:         $this->guzzle = $guzzle;
35:     }
36: 
37:     /**
38:      * {@inheritDoc}
39:      */
40:     public function request($method, $uri, array $parameters = [])
41:     {
42:         try {
43:             $response = $this->guzzle->request($method, $uri, $parameters);
44: 
45:         } catch (ClientException $e) {
46: 
47:             if (!$e->hasResponse()) {
48:                 throw $e;
49:             }
50: 
51:             throw $this->resolveExceptionClass($e);
52: 
53:         } catch (Exception $e) {
54:             throw $e;
55:         }
56: 
57:         return Response::createFromJson(json_decode($response->getBody()->getContents(), true));
58:     }
59: }
